trans-unit.source: Issue Title
trans-unit.target: Issue Title

trans-unit.source: Be as descriptive as you can with your title.
trans-unit.target: Be as descriptive as you can with your title.

trans-unit.source: If your issue requests a new topic, preface the title with [NewTopic].
trans-unit.target: If your issue requests a new topic, preface the title with [NewTopic].

trans-unit.source: General
trans-unit.target: General

trans-unit.source: We use issues to drive the discussion for changes to existing topics and the creation of new topics.
trans-unit.target: We use issues to drive the discussion for changes to existing topics and the creation of new topics.

trans-unit.source: This way, we have those discussions before significant effort is spent writing a new topic.
trans-unit.target: This way, we have those discussions before significant effort is spent writing a new topic.

trans-unit.source: Click on the Guidelines for Contributing link above for details.
trans-unit.target: Click on the Guidelines for Contributing link above for details.

trans-unit.source: Issues with Existing Topics
trans-unit.target: Issues with Existing Topics

trans-unit.source: If the issue is a simple typo or similar correction, you can just submit a PR.
trans-unit.target: If the issue is a simple typo or similar correction, you can just submit a PR.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, let us know what's wrong or what we should improve.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, let us know what's wrong or what we should improve.

trans-unit.source: Include a link to the topic.
trans-unit.target: Include a link to the topic.

trans-unit.source: Requests for new Topics
trans-unit.target: Requests for new Topics

trans-unit.source: Tell us where this topic should go in the Table of Contents.
trans-unit.target: Tell us where this topic should go in the Table of Contents.

trans-unit.source: Consider where you looked for this information before opening an issue.
trans-unit.target: Consider where you looked for this information before opening an issue.

trans-unit.source: Write an abstract
trans-unit.target: Write an abstract

trans-unit.source: In one **short** paragraph, describe what this topic will cover.
trans-unit.target: In one **short** paragraph, describe what this topic will cover.

trans-unit.source: Fill in an outline
trans-unit.target: Fill in an outline

trans-unit.source: Write a complete outline for the new topic.
trans-unit.target: Write a complete outline for the new topic.

trans-unit.source: We'll help review the outline and approve that before anyone writes a topic.
trans-unit.target: We'll help review the outline and approve that before anyone writes a topic.

trans-unit.source: Suggest reviewers
trans-unit.target: Suggest reviewers

trans-unit.source: If you know someone who can provide feedback, use '@' to ask them to review.
trans-unit.target: If you know someone who can provide feedback, use '@' to ask them to review.
